t: Nittaya Curry Paste Green Pack of 1X 1Kg Bag : Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods
s: I have tried a lot of green curry pastes but have never been happy with the flavour of the resulting Thai green curry. This has all changed since I found the Nittaya green curry paste which produces the best flavour of Thai green curry I have ever been able to produce over many years of trying.

t: Nittaya Massaman Curry Paste 1 kg : Amazon.co.uk: Grocery
s: Nittaya is far and above the best brand of pre-made thai curry paste I've tried. The Masaman curry is a particular favourite. Another reviewer mentioned the colour bothers them. Any time I make this it turns out a reddish-brown, which is how it should turn out ...

t: Amazon.com : Green Curry Paste Nittaya : Curry Sauces : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Green Curry Paste (kreung gaeng keo wahn) is a blend of spicy green chilies and herbs and is used only to make Green Curry. This Nittaya brand paste includes fresh green chilies, shallots, garlic, galangal root, lemon grass, kaffir lime peel, shrimp paste and salt.
